Source code for ast.Module

'''
Created on Mar 23, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

[docs]class Module(object):
    '''
    elements([]): the top level clafers/constraints/goals
    mName(str): module name
    '''
    
    

    def __init__(self, mName):
        self.mName = mName
        self.elements = []
        

[docs]    def addElement(self, element):
        self.elements.append(element)
        
        


[docs]    def test(self):
        print(1)
        

    def __str__(self):
        return self.mName #+ " " + ', '.join(map(str, self.elements))
    

[docs]    def toString(self, level):
        print("Module Name:" + self.mName)
        for i in self.elements:
            i.toString(level+1)
